text: Denegri is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Alberto Denegri, Peruvian football player *Aurelio Denegri, Prime Minister of Peru in 1881 *Gustavo Denegri (born 1937), Italian billionaire, chairman of DiaSorin *Jerko Ješa Denegri (born 1936), Serbian art historian and art critic *Marco Aurelio Denegri (born 1938), Peruvian intellectual Category:Italian- language surnames
title: Denegri
